backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with user profiles, vault settings, media items, albums, and access control, including CRUD-style operations and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend files for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH-based color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling authentication, profile gating, theming, and view routing.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button integrating Internet Identity with login/logout and state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/editor/ImageEdit: Modal for editing images with brightness, contrast, rotation, and filters, rendering to canvas and saving as a new media item.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: App header with navigation buttons for switching views and a login button.
Infinite-scroll media grid that displays thumbnails and loads more items as the user scrolls.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaUploa: Uploader for images and videos that creates thumbnails, tracks upload progress, and saves new media items.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaViewe: Modal viewer for photos and videos with editing, lock toggling, and metadata display.
frontend/src/components/vault/PinSetupMo: Modal for setting a new vault PIN with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/vault/VaultUnloc: Modal for entering and verifying a vault PIN to unlock protected items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlbums.ts: React Query hooks to fetch, add, and reorder albums using an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider for login, identity loading, and auth state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: React Query hooks for fetching media, adding media items, and retrieving library metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useVault.ts: Hooks for vault status queries, PIN management, unlocking, and local unlocked state tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumsPage.tsx: Albums listing page with album creation dialog and identity‑based album creation.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Displays media library with upload, filtering of locked items, and a media viewer modal.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen presenting branding and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page for theme switching and metadata backup/import options.
frontend/src/pages/VaultPage.tsx: Vault page that loads media and vault PIN status, shows setup/unlock flows, and displays locked media in a grid with viewer modal.
frontend/src/utils/imageEditing.ts: Provides an interface for image edit parameters and a function that applies brightness, contrast, rotation, and filter effects to an image via canvas and returns the edited bytes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL/hash for routing and state retention.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, container settings, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app features, requirements, known issues, and image asset needs for a photo gallery and vault app.
